/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street itself is a vibrant display of urban life, lined with lush green trees that provide a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses, the lifeblood of the city, traverse the street, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, the sunlight casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees. The perspective of the image, looking down on the street, gives a sense of scale and depth, immersing the viewer in the heart of Beijing.
